statements: UPDATE campaigns SET budget = budget + 1000 WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ads SET bid_amount = 50 WHERE ad_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE campaigns SET status = 'paused' WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE customers SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE campaigns SET budget=15000.00 WHERE campaign_id=2;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type='clicked' WHERE interaction_id=3;
UPDATE campaigns SET start_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE ads SET ad_status = 'Paused' WHERE ad_id = 101;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 201;
UPDATE campaigns SET campaign_name = 'New Campaign Name' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE ad_groups SET ad_group_name = 'New Ad Group Name' WHERE ad_group_id = 1;
UPDATE ads SET ad_name = 'New Ad Name' WHERE ad_id = 1;
